intro.description: We have had to come up with some new concepts during the development of SATC. This means that unfortunately you need to spend 10 minutes or so doing some background reading. But, don't worry, you'll find things much simpler afterwards.

item.title: Concepts
item.description: Please press Click to perform (below) to learn some background, together with significant concepts that are used within SATC. Go on, it's just one web page.
